After [[Chakra Absorption Techniques|absorbing]] his enemies' [[ninjutsu]] with the [[Rinnegan]] in his right hand, Momoshiki can release those same techniques from the Rinnegan in his left hand, using the [[chakra]] he obtains from his [[Chakra Edible Creation|pills]] to amplify their power as many times as he wishes.<ref>''[[Boruto: Naruto the Movie]]'' novel</ref> In the anime after absorbing Kinshiki, Momoshiki's golden Rinnegan turn red when he uses this technique.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 65</ref>

== Enhanced Techniques ==
* [[Deep Crimson Spiral]]
* [[Fire Release Bullet: "Blaze"]]
* [[Lightning Release Bullet: Powerful Breath]]
* [[Pheasant Hunter]]
* [[Shadow Imitation Technique]]
* [[Tailed Beast Ball]]
* [[Water Release Bullet: Orca]]
* [[Water Release: Torrent Bullet]]
* [[Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique]]

== Trivia ==
* As with other techniques of the [[Ōtsutsuki clan]], the name of this technique comes from Japanese mythology. For this technique in particular, the name comes from "Takamimusubi", one of the first three [[wikipedia:Kotoamatsukami|Kotoamatsukami]].
* In the novelisation of ''[[Boruto: Naruto the Movie]]'', Momoshiki absorbs several other techniques fired from [[Katasuke]]'s [[Shinobi Gauntlet]], including [[Wood Release]] techniques and unspecified [[Hiden]] techniques collected from [[Konoha]]'s various clans.
